Title: Relates to requiring transit projects to include installation of elevators in stations where none currently exists
Summary: Requires transit projects to include installation of elevators in stations where none currently exists and repair of existing elevators.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266-c, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring transit projects to include installation of elevators in stations where none currently exists
